subject: Your free registration account expires soon - save 25% today!
bodyHTML:
Notice: Your DNSstuff free tool access expires Oct 31, 2007 - Act now!

Dear Tony,

Your free registration account with DNSstuff.com expires on January 1, 2008.

DNS is vulnerable to attacks and availability issues. Don’t go without robust tools that allow you to control, diagnose and monitor your DNS and network settings.

Get prepared for 2008 – Buy now and take advantage of DNSstuff's in-depth tools and know-how via direct access to our experts. This will help make your life easier and your company more secure.

Purchase an annual license before price increases in mid December. Buy today for only $27! (Pricing for an annual membership will increase to $49). This upgrade will also allow you to download a DNS-specific Forrester report for FREE – a $279 value!

Your 25% coupon code must be entered when you purchase a 1, 2 or 3-year membership – CA355E1FEE.

Your account expires soon – save money and maintain your account settings. Simply login to your DNSstuff / MY ACCOUNT screen and upgrade (be sure to use your COUPON CODE: CA355E1FEE).

By the way, if you are a power WHOIS tool user – we have some great news! Effective this week, this tool will be FREE!

Thanks for your support,
Team DNSstuff

If you do not want to receive DNSstuff mailings please see below:
Unsubscribe

DNSStuff.com | 44 Merrimac Street | Newburyport, MA 01950
